tags: also i know links don't show up in search
tumblr can go jump off a cliff
title: Fic Rec
body:
I literally just finished reading this AMAZING Harry Potter WIP. It’s Harry/Draco and totally AU and IT’S FANTASTIC.

It’s a soulmate AU but doesn’t really focus so much on the soulmate piece aside from how it just kind of throws everything off-kilter. Obviously the main characters are Harry and Draco but we also see Sirius and Remus, Ron and Hermione, Draco’s Slytherin pals (not Crabbe and Goyle, though), Neville and Ginny, and occasionally Luna as well.

The author has put their own spin on magic and the HP canon’s history and their spin on canon is absolutely GLORIOUS. It’s a wild, awesome ride and sooo good.

@shanastoryteller’s survival is a talent: In the middle of their second year, Draco and Harry discover they’re soulmates and do their best to keep it a secret from everyone.

Their best isn’t perfect.

~

“Are you trying to get killed, Potter?” Malfoy drawls, stalking forward. Quick as a serpent himself, he reaches out and grabs the snake just below the head. It thrashes in his grip, but is no longer able to bite anyone. “This is a poisonous snake, and I doubt anyone brought a bezoar with them.”

Harry glares. He opens his mouth, and feels the beginning the snake’s language pass his lips, and this isn’t what he wants, what’s the point of insulting Malfoy if he can’t understand him –

Malfoy’s eyes widen. He slaps his hand over Harry’s mouth, “Potter, what the hell–”

summary: Draco has become so used to emphasising Harry’s last name that when he tries to say something nice it comes off completely...
body:
Draco has become so used to emphasising Harry’s last name that when he tries to say something nice it comes off completely sarcastic.

For example.

I’m glad I met you, Potter

Vs

I’m glad I met you, POTTER.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: my-hogwarts-mystery
blog.title: My Hogwarts Mystery - Megan Fry
blog.description:
Hello everyone, and welcome to My Hogwarts Mystery. My name is Megan Fry and I'm a student at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, representing Ravenclaw (and not because blue and black looks great on me). Hopefully you'll all enjoy getting to see everything I get up at Hogwarts and maybe we'll get to meet each other along the way.

(Disclaimer: This Tumblr is not based on real life and none of the events that happened on here ever actually happened, except on the Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery App, but can be told in a different content for entertainment. This is mainly just for entertainment purposes and to not be taken too seriously.)

(Warning: Posts on here are likely to contain inappropriate language/phrases.)

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: “You okay?”  You sighed, “Not really. Everyone keeps talking about me again. I know I should ignore them but it’s hard.” George...
caption:
“You okay?”

You sighed, “Not really. Everyone keeps talking about me again. I know I should ignore them but it’s hard.”

George wrapped his arms around you, “I know but I’m here for you. I love you and I don’t care what anyone else have to say. You’re amazing, not even your mother can change that.”

“Thank you.”

“Anything for you, my love.”

Requested By Anonymous

tags: pretty sure bill knows how to cook
and fleur doesn't but she wants to
summary: Any change in eating habits after that... incident?
question: Any change in eating habits after that... incident?
answer:
Right after the attack, Remus told me I’d probably start developing a taste for a little more … raw steaks.

Fleur handles it much better than I do.
answer_abstract: Right after the attack, Remus told me I’d probably start developing a taste for a little more … raw steaks.

summary:
Ron: Okay, I'm cool with you and Malfoy but does he need to be hanging around the dormitory all the time? 
Harry: What's wrong...
body:
Ron: Okay, I’m cool with you and Malfoy but does he need to be hanging around the dormitory all the time?

Harry: What’s wrong with it?

Ron: The other day when I was eating a tart he said “a minute on the lips a lifetime on the hips”.

Ron: I don’t need that kind of talk where I live!

Ron picks up a brownie as Draco walks past

Draco: You sure you want to eat that?

Ron: IM CURVY AND I LIKE IT

reblog.comment:

Ron: IM CURVY AND I LIKE IT

Ron: I don’t need that kind of talk where I live!

Ron picks up a brownie as Draco walks past

Draco: You sure you want to eat that?

Ron: IM CURVY AND I LIKE IT
trail.content:
Ron: Okay, I’m cool with you and Malfoy but does he need to be hanging around the dormitory all the time?

Harry: What’s wrong with it?

Ron: The other day when I was eating a tart he said “a minute on the lips a lifetime on the hips”.

Ron: I don’t need that kind of talk where I live!

Ron picks up a brownie as Draco walks past

Draco: You sure you want to eat that?

Ron: IM CURVY AND I LIKE IT

blog.name: deviantjoy
blog.title: You can't kill me, I'm not alive.
blog.description: im constantly getting crushes on either video game characters or celebrities that live like across the country from me

summary:
reasons why draco’s redeemable:
he’s a child
he didn’t want to kill dumbledore
hell he considered taking his offer and probably...
body:
reasons why draco’s redeemable:

  • he’s a child
  • he didn’t want to kill dumbledore
  • hell he considered taking his offer and probably would’ve if bellatrix and whoever else was there didn’t come
  • he was raised into being a shitty person and he never really had a choice
  • he didn’t tell the death eaters and i think voldemort himself that it was harry
  • when he was younger he was a shitty person bc he didn’t know any better and he’d been taught to be a shitty person and to act superior
  • when he was older he knew better and wanted out but couldn’t bc he knew voldemort was stronger than him and his family would probably disown him and he would lose everything
  • in a deleted scene for i think deathly hallows pt 2, draco literally threw harry’s wand back to him and tried to help him
  • and, once again, he was a CHILD

reasons why snape is not redeemable:

  • he joined a terrorist group
  • a terrorist group that specifically targeted muggleborns like lily
  • he abused his students
  • he abused his power to give and take points
  • he played favorites
  • he only fought against the evil bc it offended him, while james and lily fought for the light bc they believed in it
  • didn’t he create a hex specifically meant to torture or severely injure someone?
  • ofc he called lily a mudblood
  • he was unhealthily obsessed with lily to a truly creepy extent
  • i’m pretty sure he took a letter that lily wrote to sirius and ripped off the part that addressed it to sirius so he could pretend she sent it to him
  • he was such a shitty person that he became one of his students’ ABSOLUTE WORST FEAR
  • he literally threatened to POISON and or KILL his student’s toad bc he messed up one (1) potion
  • oh and we can’t forget how he stepped over the CORPSE of LILY’S HUSBAND while ignoring her CRYING CHILD who just watched his parents DIE and almost died himself, just so he could hold her DEAD BODY

and there’s probably so much more that i can’t think of right now
